text: I think Zubair is right. If you can’t convince yourself which one has the most potential, then you’re not ready to try any of them. I don’t think we can offer useful advice after only a momentary ponder.

elements.text: I think Zubair is right. If you can’t convince yourself which one has the most potential, then you’re not ready to try any of them. I don’t think we can offer useful advice after only a momentary ponder.

text: Thanks <@UFLN9JFRT> and <@UCGAK10LS>. I'm not closed off from other ideas in these domains and in the end the deciding factor for me is which idea I can put the best team around (or perhaps join a team on a tangentially related idea). I think they all have potential (minimum time working on each is years) but it's a complicated decision making process if you are not optimizing for just money :slightly_smiling_face:
